price: 14. Markaasaan ka abuurnaa dhibicdaa xinjir, kana abuurnaa xinjirta cad yar oo hilib ah, kana abuurnaa cadkaa hilibka lafo,  waxaana huwinnaa lafahaa hilib, markaasaan ka unugnaa abuur kale. Ee waxaa barako iyo khayr Badan Allaah, Kan u Wanaagsan abuurayaasha3.
arabic: ثُمَّ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلنُّطۡفَةَ عَلَقَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡعَلَقَةَ مُضۡغَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمُضۡغَةَ عِظَٰمٗا فَكَسَوۡنَا ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ لَحۡمٗا ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَٰهُ خَلۡقًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقِينَ
footnotes: 3. Kan ugu farsamo wanaagsan ee ah abuuraha Keliya ee Runta ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma khalaqnā al-nuṭ'fata ʿalaqatan fakhalaqnā al-ʿalaqata muḍ'ghatan fakhalaqnā al-muḍ'ghata ʿiẓāman fakasawnā al-ʿiẓāma laḥman thumma anshanāhu khalqan ākhara fatabāraka al-lahu aḥsanu al-khāliqīna
